itm_wtr.name: Holy Water

description.detailed: Water from the Lake of Gela stored in a glass bottle. This water is said to expel evil from undead creatures.

itm_wtr.use_text:
You splash some Holy Water into the face of the skeleton.
A low sigh leaves its mouth as it crumples, and lifeless bones clatter to the ground.

itm_r_bk.name: Book of Riddles

description.summary: Full of riddles and their answers.
description.detailed: A book filled with a range of riddles and their answers. Useful for sucking the fun out of puzzles.

itm_r_bk.use_text:
You search the index of the book for the PLACEHOLDER's riddle and find the answer.
'Nothing.'

itm_t_bk.name: Book of Traps

description.summary: Details common traps and how to spot them.
description.detailed: A book filled with detailed blueprints of common traps and how to spot and defuse them. Useful for avoiding nasty surprises.

itm_t_bk.use_text:
You consult the 'Spotting traps' chapter.
After observing every inch of the room, you notice something suspicious.

itm_c_bk.name: Book of Incantations

description.detailed: A dusty tome authored by the Ancient Edoc Imanok. The book seems to have been saved from a fire long ago.

itm_c_bk.use_text: You flip through the book's scorched pages until you come upon a single readable passage: 'Once in a state of observation, focus your mind on these runes: '^^vv<><>.'

itm_hp.name: Health Potion

description.detailed: A healing elixir brewed by the Ancient Alchemists. It warms your hand through the glass bottle.

itm_hp.use_text: You down the contents of the bottle. A warmth spreads through your body, healing some of your wounds.

itm_key.name: Skeleton Key

description.detailed: A magical key with a skull engraved into its head that is able to open any lock. You found it in an abandoned temple.

itm_key.use_text:
You slide the key into the lock. As you turn it, you feel a biting pain on your thumb, and yank your hand away.
Staring at the skull engraved on the Skeleton Key's head, you notice its teeth are now bloodied.
The chest unlocks.

itm_prl.name: Gela Pearl

description.detailed: A pearl formed by a colossal clam at the bottom of the Lake of Gela. It retains a fragment of the lake's spirit.

itm_prl.use_text:
You place the pearl in the small divot on the side of the plinth.
A low rumbling reminiscent of the sound of crashing waves sounds in the distance, and the clamshell opens.
Sitting inside it is a pile of treasure.

itm_swrd.name: Sword

description.summary: Is it possible to disembowel a skeleton?
description.detailed: A steel shortsword that, though dulled, is still sufficient to defend yourself with.

itm_swrd.use_text: Your sword swings and sticks into the side of the skeleton. A raspy shriek escapes its skull as you rip the sword back out, taking a rib with it.

description.detailed: A map of the dungeon. A simple enchantment upon it shows you your current location. You stole it from your now-former employer.

itm_trch.name: Torch

description.detailed: A flaming torch that can be used to burn away dry material (such as vines (hint hint)).

itm_trch.use_text:
You bring the torch close to the thinner of the vines.
The tips of the flames lick their shrivelled leaves, setting the whole mass of tendrils aflame.
An intense warmth momentarily fills the room, but as the flaming vines crumble away, it is once again replaced by the cold of the stone walls of the dungeon.
Your way forward is no longer obstructed.

itm_btl.name: Glass Bottle

description.detailed: An empty glass bottle with a cork. Could be used to hold something.

itm_btl.use_text:
You uncork the bottle gently and submerge it in the water, allowing it to fill completely.
As you reinsert the cork, you notice the almost pearlescent quality of the water against the light of the bioluminescent bulbs above.

itm_pbl.name: Pebbles

description.detailed:
Small, round stones. They've most likely made their way into the dungeon through the subterranean rivers that feed the reservoir.
These rivers flow from the Lake of Gela, a sacred body of water bordered by hostile rocks that prevent any entry to it aboveground.
For this reason, this underground reservoir was constructed, with easy access to it via a
well, as the lake's water was coveted by alchemists for the power it holds.

itm_pbl.use_text:
You take a pebble from your collection and rub it between your fingers.
Its cool, smooth surface calms you.

itm_invs.name: Mysterious Potion

description.detailed: This unique ancient elixir bestows upon the drinker a power that is useful for bad fighters.

itm_invs.use_text:
After you swallow the last of the potion, your skin begins to tingle.
Flames spring from the tips of your fingertips. They crawl up your arms and across your skin until they envelop you entirely, but they don't burn.
Once the flames dissipate, you realise you can no longer see your arms or legs.
You are now invisible.
